comments:
If GenModel.templateLocation is an empty string, the new GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.getUserTemplatePath() method throws the following exception:

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 0
	at java.lang.String.charAt(String.java:558)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createPlatformURI(URI.java:969)
	at org.eclipse.emf.common.util.URI.createPlatformResourceURI(URI.java:918)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.getUserTemplatePath(GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.java:262)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.AbstractGeneratorAdapter.getTemplatePath(AbstractGeneratorAdapter.java:434)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.AbstractGeneratorAdapter.createJETEmitter(AbstractGeneratorAdapter.java:405)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.AbstractGeneratorAdapter.getJETEmitter(AbstractGeneratorAdapter.java:394)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenEnumGeneratorAdapter.generateEnumClass(GenEnumGeneratorAdapter.java:97)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenEnumGeneratorAdapter.generateModel(GenEnumGeneratorAdapter.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.generator.GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.doGenerate(GenBaseGeneratorAdapter.java:214)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.AbstractGeneratorAdapter.generate(AbstractGeneratorAdapter.java:275)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.generator.Generator.generate(Generator.java:600)
	at org.eclipse.emf.codegen.ecore.genmodel.presentation.GenModelActionBarContributor$GenerateAction$1.execute(GenModelActionBarContributor.java:370)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1742)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

Previously, this was guarded by GenModel.dynamicTemplates, but the real fix is simply to ensure that the template location is not an empty string before attempting to create a platform resource URI.

The fix is in CVS.
Actually, fixed in 2.3.0.I200611161558, not the maintenance branch.
